description: Try our easy to follow Potato Salad With Smoky Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Potato Salad With Smoky Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir sour cream and garam masala together. Drizzle over potato salad and toss gently to combine. Sprinkle with almonds. Serving suggestion: Toss a salsa verde through the potato salad to serve.
